amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available in this Act may be used to transfer a mine-resistant ambush protected vehicle under section 2576a of title 10, United States Code.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer mine-resistant ambush protected vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 262 (Roll no. 353).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 262 (Roll no. 353).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
